name: IpOptionsList
brief:
Container for user-specified algorithmic options

OptionsList stores runtime-configurable parameters as string key-value
pairs. Supports integer, numeric, and string option types with automatic
conversion. Tracks how many times each option has been accessed (useful
for detecting unused options).

Options are case-insensitive. Values can be set via:
- SetNumericValue(), SetIntegerValue(), SetStringValue()
- ReadFromStream() for ipopt.opt format files

Integrates with RegisteredOptions for validation and default values.
see: IpRegOptions.hpp for option registration and validation
